column5: My husband and I have been hosting guests around the world since 2007. My goal is to make sure our guests feel comfortable at home. Our room is cozy with desk and closet. We also provide high quality of hospitality towels for your use. The location is unbeatable, Convenient to Hwy. 290, Hwy. 183 and SH-130. Close to major employers like Samsung, Dell and Applied Materials. Only 10 miles to the University of Texas, 20 min to downtown and to the airport.
column8: Private room close to IT Dist Apple,Samsung,Dell
